trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler>delegado é definido para o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento de <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application, as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET, conforme mostrado no exemplo deste tópico.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event is raised at the end of page execution if the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento é gerado no final da execução da página, se o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A> method automatically determines whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or <xref:System.DateTime> objects have been changed, by checking the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A> property value for each <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> in the user profile.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>método determina automaticamente se propriedades que são compostos de tipos primitivos, cadeias de caracteres, ou <xref:System.DateTime>objetos tiverem sido alterados, verificando o <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A>para cada valor da propriedade <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue>no perfil do usuário.</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A> method cannot explicitly determine whether a custom class has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>método explicitamente não pode determinar se uma classe personalizada foi alterado.</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and then either continue with the automatic save if the object has been modified or cancel the automatic save if the object has not been modified.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento para determinar se um objeto personalizado foi modificado e, em seguida, continue com o salvamento automático, se o objeto tiver sido modificado ou cancelar o salvamento automático, se o objeto não tiver sido modificado.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the automatic profile save operation, set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> property to `false` in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event; otherwise, set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para cancelar o perfil automático de operação de gravação, defina o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>propriedade `false` no <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento; caso contrário, defina o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>

trans-unit.source: There may be multiple subscribers to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver vários assinantes para o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> will use the last value that the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>será usado o último valor que o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>estiver definida como.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is recommended that you explicitly set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event regardless of whether you are canceling or continuing with the automatic save, as you may need to overwrite the value set by an earlier subscriber.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, é recomendável que você definir explicitamente o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento independentemente se você está cancelando ou continuar com o salvamento, automático, talvez seja necessário substituir o valor definido por um assinante anterior.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.Context%2A> property to the specified <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: O ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs cria uma instância da <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs>classe e define a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.Context%2A>propriedade especificada <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.Context%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> da solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs>objeto fornece informações de evento para o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento de <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto fornece acesso para o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>da solicitação atual.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> para a solicitação atual

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> will automatically save the user profile.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"> </xref> salvará automaticamente o perfil de usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A> method automatically determines whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or <xref:System.DateTime> objects have been changed, by checking the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A> property value for each <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> in the user profile.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>método determina automaticamente se propriedades que são compostos de tipos primitivos, cadeias de caracteres, ou <xref:System.DateTime>objetos tiverem sido alterados, verificando o <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A>para cada valor da propriedade <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue>no perfil do usuário.</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A> method cannot explicitly determine whether a custom class has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>método explicitamente não pode determinar se uma classe personalizada foi alterado.</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and then either continue with the automatic save if the object has been modified or cancel the automatic save if the object has not been modified.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento para determinar se um objeto personalizado foi modificado e, em seguida, continue com o salvamento automático, se o objeto tiver sido modificado ou cancelar o salvamento automático, se o objeto não tiver sido modificado.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the automatic profile save operation, set the ContinueWithProfileAutoSave property to `false` in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event; otherwise, set the ContinueWithProfileAutoSave property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para cancelar o perfil automático de operação de gravação, defina a propriedade ContinueWithProfileAutoSave `false` no <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento; caso contrário, defina a propriedade ContinueWithProfileAutoSave `true`.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: There may be multiple subscribers to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver vários assinantes para o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> will use the last value that the ContinueWithProfileAutoSave property is set to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>usará o último valor definido para a propriedade ContinueWithProfileAutoSave.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is recommended that you explicitly set the ContinueWithProfileAutoSave property in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event whether you are canceling or continuing with the automatic save, as you may need to overwrite the value set by an earlier subscriber.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, é recomendável que você defina explicitamente a propriedade ContinueWithProfileAutoSave no <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>evento Cancelar ou continuar com o automático termos de salvar, como talvez seja necessário substituir o valor definido por um assinante anterior.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> will automatically save the user profile; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"> </xref> salvará automaticamente o perfil de usuário; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
